featured.text: The castle was so big that it was once the city of Bam itself.
An old mud and straw castle.
Bam was a city of mud-brick houses, old monuments and an ancient castle.
Bam was best known for its 2,000-year-old castle built out of mud, straw, and the trunks of palm trees.

definition.zh_def: 城堡：通常是中世紀的防禦性建築，通常由高牆和塔樓組成，作為貴族或君主的居所。
definition.en_def: A castle is a large fortified building or set of buildings, typically from the medieval period, used as a residence for nobility or royalty.
definition.example: The king lived in a grand castle on the hill.
